cu.error_type: unreachable elements or wrong routing definitions
cu.explanation_en: Changing the remote S address to an unreachable subnet (10.0.0.3) will prevent the CU from connecting to the DU, causing F1 interface failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the local N address to an invalid format 'invalid.local' will cause IP parsing errors and prevent network binding.
du.explanation_zh: 將本地 N 地址設定為無效格式 'invalid.local' 會導致 IP 解析錯誤，並阻止網路綁定。
